mapper.insert: INSERT INTO temp_reservation ( order_id, property_id, user_id, reserved_date, reserved_time, info, deposit, status, created_at ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{propertyId}, #{userId}, #{reservedDate}, #{reservedTime}, #{info}, #{deposit}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id AS tempId, order_id, property_id, user_id, info, reserved_date, reserved_time, deposit FROM temp_reservation WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments ( order_id, user_id, payment_key, amount, item_name, status, created_at ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{paymentKey}, #{amount}, #{itemName}, #{status}, NOW() )
